content: On the evening of July 22, in Zhengzhou, a person was electrocuted to death due to heavy rain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In recent days, residents of Xipu Street, Pidu District, Chengdu, Sichuan Province have continued to oppose the construction of a sewage treatment plant near their community.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Serious bloody warning]
On July 15, in the Fanrong Community of Chaihe Forestry Bureau, Hailin City, Heilongjiang Province,
a seven-year-old child was hacked to death with a knife.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens are discussing "People born after 1990 will retire at 65":

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 16, local reports in Shenzhen said that a 73-year-old man at the Municipal People's Hospital needed a lung transplant. For the first time, Shenzhen used a helicopter to transport lungs. The entire process from Guangzhou to Shenzhen took only 33 minutes. Some netizens questioned the patient's identity and the source of the organ.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The "Decision" of the Third Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee deleted the expression "public ownership as the main body". Hu Xijin highly praised this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 23 marks the first anniversary of the collapse of the gymnasium of Qiqihar No. 34 Middle School

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/AgrkxV3rQL

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of July 23, representatives of 14 Palestinian factions signed the Beijing Declaration in Beijing.
The Beijing dialogue among Palestinian factions made it clear that the PLO is the only legitimate representative of the Palestinian people. They also reached a consensus on the post-war governance of Gaza and the establishment of a temporary national reconciliation government. At the same time, they called for the realization of an independent Palestinian state in accordance with relevant UN resolutions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 23, a traffic policeman was beaten by a driver while checking an electric bike on the streets of Xichang, Sichuan. The driver was then controlled by special police and citizens who arrived.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Under a video reporting on the protests in Bangladesh, other netizens reported the comments supporting the protests to the local police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on July 23, in order to help solve local financial difficulties, the central government is studying the introduction of local additional taxes.
In the recently announced decision, one of the core ideas is to increase local independent financial resources, expand local tax sources, and appropriately expand local tax management authority.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 22, Kunming, Yunnan. A signboard fell down from a store along Jinjiang Road, injuring passers-by. The accident injured 10 people, of whom 3 died after being sent to hospital for treatment. The mother of the deceased: her 6-year-old daughter has passed away, and her 4-year-old daughter is still in the ICU. "Ten hours after the incident, no responsible party came to deal with the matter, only two community staff and police officers."
Official report: Learn from this and do a good job and get the facts right.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 19, China Youth Daily reported: The suicide phenomenon among the elderly in rural areas has reached a shocking level! 
After changing into clean clothes, the 69-year-old man sat in the middle of the main room, burning paper money for himself in the brazier while drinking half a bottle of pesticide. The paper money was half burned, and the old man lay on the ground unconscious.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 22, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs: decided to cancel the countermeasures against Viasat. The spokesperson of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs did not disclose the reason for lifting the sanctions, nor did he explain what had changed.
It is reported that this American satellite communications giant had previously been sanctioned by China for participating in arms sales to Taiwan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The mother said that the child had been transferred to a more authoritative children's hospital. So far, no one from the responsible party has come.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The accident scene has been cleaned up

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of now, the Weibo topic #90后养老时间延到65岁后# has been deleted by the platform

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Under the video of the Bangladeshi people's protest, netizens ridiculed themselves: "I am a coward, I dare not do anything to eat poisonous food oil"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a clothing advertisement endorsed by Xiao S's daughter was hung on the big screen of Chongqing Tianjie, which was boycotted by netizens. Netizens said that they would call the Chongqing Municipal Government to report it. In response, the AIVEI brand said that the billboard has been removed and the official website cooperation has ended. It is reported that Xiao S's daughter Xu Shaoen once posted a message saying that her mother tongue is English, which was questioned by netizens as having a problematic stance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 22, Guiyang, Guizhou. Blogger "大娲无坑" secretly visited a clinic and found that a 140-yuan drug was sold to a patient for 2,980 yuan. It is reported that the local Health Commission has intervened.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 23, China's stock market suffered its worst sell-off in six months. As of the close, the Shanghai Composite Index fell 1.65%, the Shenzhen Component Index fell 2.97%, and the ChiNext Index fell 3.04%.
Comments pointed out that the lack of major policy support after the Third Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee has exacerbated bearish sentiment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Historian Xu Zhuoyun said in the program "13 Invitations Season 8" that "China has gone through so much suffering, and today's young people really have nothing left."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: This is a report from ten years ago.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 20, Cangzhou, Hebei. Traffic police use roadblock caps to hit moving electric bikes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 21, Zunyi, Guizhou. A man in Shahe Community stabbed a woman with a knife. The video showed that the woman was covered in blood and the man was handcuffed by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 23, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security stated: "The overall employment rate of college graduates and young people was stable in the first half of the year, and the employment of migrant workers was steady and improved," which aroused doubts and ridicule from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 23, Chongqing. Victims of Jiufu’s bankruptcy went to the Financial Office to defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens said that their accounts were banned because they mentioned Xi Jinping in the voice chat of the NetEase game "Naraka: Bladepoint".
